Zurich

1Passenger

Economy

Adults - 1

Children - 0

2- 12 Years

Infants - 0

0- 23 Months

Nestled between bright blue lakes and the snow-capped Alps, Zurich is a modern city with a historic touch. Known as the hub of economic trade and financial importance, the city is a remarkable place straight out of a fairy tale. Be it big castles, forts, museums, or churches, Zurich is a thrilling place to visit. Apart from amusements and big buildings, you can find exciting nightlife and great shopping experiences. If you are someone who loves serenity and enjoys magicalism, then visit Zurich on your next trip.

When is the Best Time to Book a Flight to Zurich?

Zurich can be visited at any time of the year. However, the best seasons to visit are definitely during shoulder seasons, such as April-May and September-October or low seasons like November-March. To snag the cheapest flight to Zurich ensure you are booking 2-6 months in advance. Avoid any last-minute flights, as they will be way too pricey.

What are the Major Attractions of Zurich?

Zurich is a fantastic place to be as it boasts a number of castles, museums, art galleries, and contemporary and ancient architecture. However, if you do not enjoy such art exhibits or places, there are activities, such as swimming and hiking. For a more relaxed feeling, you can stop by Lindenhof to enjoy the spectacular view of the city. Here is what to explore when visiting Zurich;

  • Lake Zurich
  • Old Town
  • Museum of Art
  • Uetliberg
  • Lindenhof
  • Great Minster
  • Swiss National Museums
  • Bahnhofstrasse

Major International Airports of Zurich

If you wish to travel to Zurich and experience the fairytale feeling then book your tickets today. The city has six major international airports connecting tourists from all over the world. Check out the list below.

  • Zurich Airport (ZRH)
  • Geneva Airport (GVA)
  • EuroAirport Basel Mulhouse Freiburg (BSL)
  • Bern Airport (BRN)
  • Lugano Airport (LUG)
  • Sion Airport (SIR)

Tips to Book Cheap Flights to Zurich

It's always good to know some tips and tricks when booking cheap flights for your preferred destination. Scroll down below to read the handy tips;

  • Consider traveling midweek, generally between Tuesdays and Thursdays, as fares are comparatively cheaper.
  • Look for alternative airports from where you might get cheaper flights to your dream destination.
  • Use different search engines to compare different prices on other platforms.
  • Ensure to subscribe to the airline newsletter to stay updated.

Which are the Major Airlines Flying to Zurich?

Zurich Airport is a major European hub served by top airlines worldwide. Whether you're flying for business or leisure, here are the key carriers connecting you to Switzerland's largest city.

  • Swiss Airlines
  • Lufthansa Airlines
  • United Airlines
  • EasyJet
  • Scandinavian Airlines
  • Eurowings
  • American Airlines
  • British Airways
  • Air Canada
  • TAP Portugal
